alert.note: Alert for Central St. Louis; North Cass; Northern Aitkin; South Itasca (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 16 at 5:24PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Itasca, northwestern Aitkin and east central Cass Counties through 600 PM CDT... At 523 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Gunn, to 6 miles south of Days High Landing, to 7 miles west of Remer, to Longville, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. The Grand Rapids Airport recorded a wind gust of 30 mph at 512 PM. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Grand Rapids and Gunn around 530 PM CDT. Cohasset, Warba and Pokegama Lake around 555 PM CDT. Swan River around 600 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Boy Lake, Blackberry, Washburn Lake, Goodland, Thunder Lake, Split Hand Lake, Tobique, Laura Lake, Floodwood Lake and La Prairie. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle. These storms may intensify. Monitor local NOAA Weather Radio, commercial radio, or television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Central St. Louis; North Cass; Northern Aitkin; South Itasca
